name: Where's my Balloon?
description:
Where's my Balloon?
by K. A. Laherty 2015

"in the year xxxx2, A very pixelated monochrome individual lost his kitty.
After much shooting and jumping, he saved his kitty.
It seemed all was right in the galaxy.

But 2000 years later....
A green badly drawn pickle-biped purchased a balloon,
But then some unknown force stole his balloon.
Now the shooting and jumping must start all over again..."

Controls:

X = "Shoot"
Y = "Jump"
Esc. = "Quit game"
Left arrow key = "walk left"
Right arrow key = "walk right"
Alt + Enter = "Switch from fullscreen to window"
